comments:
Problem confirmed in WTP 1.5RC6

To reproduce:

1) Start Eclipse with a new workspace (all WTP requisites installed of course)
2) From the Package Explorer do File->New->Project->Dynamic Web Project
3) In the Configurations drop-down select "JavaServer Faces v1.1 Project" *before* naming the project.
4) Click Next and Next again.  Note that the JSF Capabilities page is not reachable (Next not enabled).
5) Clicking finish will produce errors in the Error Log like this one:

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.jst.jsf.core.internal.jsflibraryconfig.JSFLibraryConfigModelAdapter.updateProjectDependencies(JSFLibraryConfigModelAdapter.java:73)
at org.eclipse.jst.jsf.core.internal.project.facet.JSFFacetInstallDelegate.execute(JSFFacetInstallDelegate.java:89)
at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core.internal.FacetedProject.callDelegate(FacetedProject.java:1220)
at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core.internal.FacetedProject.modifyInternal(FacetedProject.java:371)
at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core.internal.FacetedProject.access$0(FacetedProject.java:266)
at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core.internal.FacetedProject$1.run(FacetedProject.java:251)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1737)
at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core.internal.FacetedProject.modify(FacetedProject.java:256)
at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.ui.AddRemoveFacetsWizard.performFinish(AddRemoveFacetsWizard.java:334)
at org.eclipse.wst.web.ui.internal.wizards.NewProjectDataModelFacetWizard.performFinish(NewProjectDataModelFacetWizard.java:236)
at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.ui.AddRemoveFacetsWizard$2.run(AddRemoveFacetsWizard.java:260)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1737)
at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.ui.AddRemoveFacetsWizard$3.run(AddRemoveFacetsWizard.java:274)
at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:113)
This bug is an unresolved duplicate of 146085.
*** Bug 146085 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Created an attachment (id=45410)
Patch script

To apply patch to org.eclipse.jst.jsf.ui plug-in.

Created an attachment (id=45605)
New patch to obsolete old one

This patch is to log a message when project is null and externalize a string to message bundle.
Fix verified in M-1.5.1-200609221939 on WinXP.  Steps to reproduce no longer cause errors.
